##The women of Mount Vulcan

Wechat, renwumag1980

Feature Introduction, the best Chinese character report

When the outbreak is critical, Wuhan temporary new Huoshenshan Hospital and Leishenshan Hospital. Among them, the contribution of women construction workers. Usually, they work hard on the construction site, earning a small salary, but often not seen. They are powerful women.

In International Women's Day, we choose to tell their stories.

When the outbreak is critical, Wuhan temporary new Huoshenshan Hospital and Leishenshan Hospital. Among them, the contribution of women construction workers. Usually, they work hard on the construction site, earning a small salary, but often not seen. They are powerful women.

In International Women's Day, we choose to tell their stories.

By Yuqing Tu

Editor, sugar maple

Pounce

Still Restless. After 20 days of isolation at home from the Vulcan Mountain construction site, Hu Xiaohong pedaled down the stairs and asked the residents if they still needed volunteers. Two days running in a row, they said it was full.

In this neighborhood in Jiangxia District, Wuhan, no one knew that Hu Xiaohong, 43, was one of the first workers to go to work on the construction of the Huoshenshan Hospital. She used to be a construction worker, and now she's both. On the evening of the New Year's Eve, she gathered 30 workmates to rush to the Vulcan Mountain construction site. They all called her "Hu Jie" , Hu Jie know the boss, often can contact the work.

The day before that, January 23, Wuhan was closed because of a new outbreak of pneumonia. Also on that day, Hu Xiaohong had just finished building an isolation ward in a hospital in Wuhan. However, there are not enough wards in existing hospitals to take in patients. The new Huoshenshan hospital is expected to be built in 10 days and will provide 1,000 beds in Wuhan. Most of the workers available at this time were local workers in Wuhan. Over the years, Wuhan and Jiangxia District have developed a surprise industry of different kinds of work, where important people can be found at any time. As soon as news of the construction of the Vulcan Mountain Hospital came in, the commando workers rushed over.

On New Year's Eve, Hu Xiaohong had planned to have New Year's Eve dinner with her daughter and son. But at the other end of the phone is her just on the line of the boss, Hu Xiaohong some worry about themselves not to, after it is difficult to receive the company's work.

The caller worried, Hu Xiaohong also worried, only half of the meal. She was wearing nothing but a hard hat, gloves, reflective clothing and a face mask, and green cotton boots. That night, during a thunderstorm, she got into a van and set off.

Hu Xiaohong gave up the New Year's Eve dinner, and workers rushed to Wuhan overnight to the construction of the Fushen mountain network

The next morning at 7:00, Hu Xiaohong led the workers to the scene to draw lines and plant flags. The rainy day is very comfortable, there is no ash on the construction site, is a bit windy, and catch up with the menstrual period, blow a headache. The pavement has not yet hardened, she changed into the company issued boots, a foot a mud pit.

There's a lot of noise. It's all about the yelling. It was the first time she had ever seen so many excavators working at the same time. The atmosphere was so different that morale was suddenly boosted. It's like fighting a war. If others are so willing (to do the work) , we must help. " She thought, "It's a pleasure to be here. ".

Some workers recall that they could change their masks every four hours or so at meal times. Everyone wears a mask to work. During the meal, some of the workers will be separated from each other for some distance. Hu Xiaohong never take the initiative to mention the epidemic, afraid of affecting everyone's mood, after the project to go home after some fear, bought medicine, isolated at home every day to drink. But it was too busy at the scene, Ms. Hu said. There was no time to think about infection.

Huoshenshan hospital project time is tight, between different procedures, between the construction units have a lot of cross-work. Hu and the workers'tasks include laying dust-proof and moisture-proof mats on just-compacted surfaces, then yards of rebar and reinforcing bars.

There's a lot of unscheduled work to do. A load of rebar that was supposed to be dropped nearby, the truck driver dropped it a mile away. She and the workers have to carry it. Six meters of steel, four or five a bundle, a trip will have a hundred pounds, the shoulder immediately wear red. The construction site vehicle many people are many, moves when must pay attention not to bump into, accidentally easy to fall, in the mud crawls all can not climb up.

A large number of female workers came into the field while the rebar was being laid. Reinforcing steel is a fine work, usually mostly done by female workers. After the bars are laid lengthwise and crosswise, they need to be secured with thin wire. Like knitting a sweater, use a small l-shaped Hook to tie the thin wire into a knot at the intersection.

Bar Is Assembly line work, a simple action, repeatedly, but to squat on the ground, a squat is a day, workers can not sit, also can not stand.

CCTV broadcast live 24 hours a day about the construction sites of Mount Vulcan and Mount Thor. Many netizens watched it online. One of them tweeted, "watching the live broadcast of Mount Thor that day, it happened that the concrete ground was reinforced. All of them were female workers squatting on the ground, swish forward. This telephoto shot, it was just mind-blowing. "

Han Taobao, 52, is one of the women who put in the rebar. She's on a geriatrics machine, no Internet, and she didn't know about the new pneumonia until she saw the news on TV. I've been told it's contagious. But she thought it was nothing, that she was well enough to bear it. "when the hospital is done, they can send their patients. "

At 5:40 am, it was still dark in Wuhan. It was drizzling and cold. Han Taobao went out when his son is still sleeping, two girls married, do not live at home, go to the site of things she did not discuss with the children. The husband is the logistics driver, Wuhan New Crown Pneumonia outbreak, has been working in the company. Han Taobao sat in the van to the construction site, the day slowly light, the first time she saw the construction site of the Vulcan Mountain Hospital. Thousands of workers wear masks to work, they can't tell men from women. Seeing so many people there, she was a little worried about the heart was put down.

Other women workers came, too, and neither the accountant nor Xin Hongfang, a farmer in the countryside, ever set foot on the construction site. When their husbands signed up, they wanted to help. At the time of the outbreak, Liang Ji, hoping to bring his 15-year-old son to the battle, heard that there was a shortage of workers at the scene. They were given the task of making iron-sheet wind pipes on the construction site, hammering the pieces of iron into cuboids. "It was like a firecracker, " she said. After an hour or sixteen, she couldn't hear her voice at all, and her head was still buzzing.

Xin Hongfang said, usually in the countryside, these physical work she felt no problem, but the Labor time is too long, a bit too much. This is the first time that I have tried hard physical work. At the end of the day, I have to walk from the construction site to the parking place of the hotel ferry for 30 minutes. "I'll never forget that feeling, " she said. "

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
A network of female workers carrying construction materials on the construction site of Huoshenshan Mountain

Busboy

On the fourth day of the first lunar month, the rain in Wuhan cleared up for several days. On the construction site of Huoshen Mountain, Hu Xiaohong's rain boots wore for 5 days, and blisters appeared under her feet. On the ninth day of the first lunar month, the Fire God mountain official delivery, Hu Xiaohong also left the construction site on that day. When she arrived, she did not know that she would be staying in a centrally arranged hotel when she entered the construction site and could not go home. Brought the cotton clothes have not been changed, close-fitting wear had to wash every day, and then blow-dry with a hair dryer. His face was chapped and his hands felt like thorns. It hurts like hell. "

The hands are also injured, Hu Xiaohong right hand in the middle point to the left bend some, but she does not remember which time this injury. Ten nails are replaced every year, the new ones are pink and fleshy, the first half of the protruding grey nails are not yet shed, separated by a layer of blood scab. Nail binding feet more common, pain can not stand, every time Hu Xiaohong will cry, endure work to go home, the sole has swollen.

Once, Hu Xiaohong was 3 meters high steel pipe hit the head, fainted on the spot. After going to the hospital for surgery, he took some time off and went back to the site. But the weather that encounters strong wind and insolation, can frowzily have a headache, in the bag all the year round should be prepared with Acetaminophen.

Women make up 34.8 percent of all migrant workers, according to the 2018 monitoring report on migrant workers released by the National Bureau of Statistics of the People's Republic of China. At a meeting of the China Iron and Steel Association this year, Zheng Xuexuan, general manager of China Construction Group, also mentioned that in the past, women construction workers were rarely seen on construction sites in China, and women did all the back-office work, there are more and more female construction workers now.

According to a local recruiter who has worked for more than 20 years, women tend to work "small jobs" , working 8-10 hours a day for 150-200 wages, half as much as the more skilled "big jobs" (mostly men) .

Yang Yuanyuan is the head of a labor force, also in the construction of the Third Bureau of the General Contracting Company after receiving the notice of urgent mobilization to the Fire Mountain. In her past observations, some of the "big jobs" , such as plumbers and welders, were more skilled and less physically demanding. Most of the rebar makers are women, and many of the handymen are women, carrying heavy loads and doing heavy physical work. Many mudders bring their wives with them to the construction site. The husband builds the wall and the wife carries the mortar for him and the Ash. She had to keep moving on the construction site, a day may be a woman on the construction site to walk 30,000,40,000 steps. In addition, the construction site opened tower crane drivers, electrical workers are mostly women.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
Yang Yuanyuan (first from left) works on a construction site

Four years ago, Hu Xiaohong was a housewife. High school costs money for her two children; her husband doesn't make enough; she works. Flexible site time, convenient to take care of the family, the family can rest when something is happening.

But she did not know anyone on the construction site. At first, she rode her bicycle around looking for projects. When she arrived at a construction site, she asked her boss if she still needed a handyman. She gradually moved 6 meters long steel pipe, 30 kilograms of goods, learn to drill, yards of steel, steel bar.

Hu Xiaohong loves to sing, usually see everyone work tired, she sang "Pink Memories" , sometimes is "daughter Love" , sometimes is her favorite Song Qi Qin. The male workers at the scene followed her. "sometimes we get carried away in our work. We daydream. We sing and shout and work with great vigor. Some people call her "stupid, " but she doesn't care what people think, "as long as I'm happy. "

When resting on the construction site, she will organize everyone to do childhood games, such as and the construction site of the sisters in the just-built roughcast room play Eagle catch chicken, throw handkerchiefs. They laughed and shouted as if no one was there. It's a little bit of freedom that comes with work.

Well, maybe she's the one who always brings the crew together. During her four years on the job, she had a group of trusted sisters who formed their own commando team of female workers. Hu Xiaohong can speak Mandarin, voice bright, work is often outstanding one, became a "band. ".

When directing workers, her voice cuts through the muffled machinery. One day, she and her men went to pull the cable, which was long and heavy. Someone had to shout for rhythm. We all worked hard together to move it. Several Foreman Voice Hoarse, Hu Xiaohong stood out, the speaker did not, repeatedly shouted, "Go" , "Go" , "you are good. "until you can't speak.

More often, Hu Xiaohong in the construction site with the female workers, in order to save take-away money, they get up early to do box lunch, to noon are cool, many people have stomach problems. They look out for each other. Many carry snacks in their bags. Anyone who is hungry or has an upset stomach can find food in their sister's bag.

Han Taobao likes to chat at the construction site. Some people say they want to save money for their son to buy a house. Some women workers worried about their own work outside, children living in school can not eat good food. They also talk about how much cured meat this year, where to pay New Year, the child has to make money for the family.

Hu Xiaohong likes to go out. Sometimes she would go for a walk in a nearby gym and watch the girls dance, but she wouldn't just stand by and watch. When she's alone at home, she turns on the Jiggle and learns a few dance moves.

Men are still in the majority at the construction site. Occasionally, she would encounter attempts to stalk and molest female workers on the site. At first, she was afraid, always avoiding the jokers and hands-on people. The more afraid you are, the more they will bully you. She had to be bold.

Once, a male worker came up to her and some of her sisters to urinate. She ran up to him and yelled, and he ran off in the clay. Her sister said, "sister Hu, thank God you're here. You don't know how many times he's done this. "The first thing she told the man in charge of the site was that if he was not expelled, she and her sisters would have to take off the man's clothes and hang him on the site.

Every time, she wins.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
The women squatted on the ground to tie up the steel bar network

Mother

The women, mostly in their 40s and 50s, work to send their children to school and choose the site to make time for them. Even so, Hu Xiaohong still felt ashamed of the child. She thought that if she could be like some parents with their children, not to go out to work, not to go out to earn money, to accompany his son, every day to bring him food, he might do better grades, will not go to vocational school.

That's why she came to the site. She was in charge of cleaning up industrial waste at Vulcan Mountain Hospital. She's not much of a Talker, but she works harder on construction sites than men. Two hundred pipes, one on each shoulder, and sometimes the workmen, tired of carrying, sat down to rest, but she carried the load until the next truck came, and then rested for a few minutes.

Wei Cuimei did not think of changing her job when she was most tired. With four children, the youngest is 14, and construction work usually starts at 7 a.m. and ends around 5 p.m. , so she can make dinner for the children.

The family lives in a small community in Jiangxia District. She had just returned to her hometown of Foshan, Jiangxia District, for more than a year before she was sent to help build Mount Vulcan. After receiving the task of building the Fire God Mountain Hospital, she went to the construction site overnight, the two children are still in the countryside. After getting down from the Fire God Mountain Hospital, many places in Wuhan were closed off. She could not go to Shuan township again from the city, and the children could not return to the city.

An unexpected situation has arisen. The first day of school has been delayed, and classes are taking place all over the Internet. Before this, Hu Xiaohong never thought, two children need to use two mobile phones to surf the Internet class, but only one smart phone in the countryside. She wanted to buy another smartphone with Internet access, but found she couldn't deliver it because of road closures.

Daughter in the high school focus class, grades in the top 10 grades. My son's grades weren't great. He went to a vocational high school. In the end, the daughter who did well in school was given the opportunity to use her mobile phone for online lessons. She cherishes it. She gets up at 6:00 every morning to study, and she finishes at 10:00 at night. But my son's studies are out of focus.

Hu Xiaohong call the mayor hotline, ask for favors everywhere, want to send his son a mobile phone to the countryside. But in the face of the many pressing problems posed by the COVID-19, the challenge of giving my son an Internet lesson on a cell phone went unanswered. But for her mother, Hu Xiaohong, it's a big deal that children can't read.

In an interview with people, she talked about a lot of work fatigue and embarrassment, but only when talking about online classes, Hu Xiaohong burst into tears in the interview, delayed the children's learning, she did not know what to do. "I can't face my two children. "

Reading is of the utmost importance to her. She always regretted a decision she made in the fifth grade. The other day she was looking at a borrowed copy of the story society. Her father asked her, "do you know all these words? "? " She was so happy and wanted her father's praise, she said, "all of them. ". But her father said to her, "then you must not study next term. If I send you to study, it will be for someone else. ". "

She said, "If I had told my dad I couldn't read, I might have gone to school for another year. "

Haven't you seen enough?
